```{r}
library(tidyverse)
install.packages("flextable")
library(flextable)
install.packages("zoo")
library(zoo)
```
```{r}
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/master/us-counties.csv"
covid <- read.csv(url)
```

## Question 2: Daily Summary
```{r}
my.date <- as_date("2022-01-01")
my.state <- "Colorado"

covid %>% 
  filter(state == my.state) %>% 
  group_by(county) %>% 
  mutate()
```
